  • Constructor Details

    • Teacher

      public Teacher(String ID, String password)
      Constructor for creating a teacher with the given ID and password.
      Parameters:
      ID - The unique identifier for the teacher.
      password - The password for authentication.

    • Teacher

      public Teacher(String userName, String UserID, UserType userType, Course course, int maxstudentsnum, int rate, TeacherType teacherType)
      Constructor for creating a teacher with specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      userName - The name of the teacher.
      UserID - The unique identifier for the teacher.
      userType - The type of the user (Teacher).
      course - The course associated with the teacher.
      maxstudentsnum - The maximum number of students the teacher can have.
      rate - The rate of the teacher.
      teacherType - The type of the teacher (e.g., MASTER, PROFESSOR).

      Puts a mark for a student.
      Parameters:
      ID - The unique identifier of the student.
      marktype - The type of the mark (1 for first attestation, 2 for second attestation, 3 for final mark).
      point - The point value of the mark.
      semester - The semester for which the mark is assigned.
